post.excerpt: Every so often, you just have to pick up the camera to take a picture of something. This morning, it was the sky directly outside my front door. I’ll let the picture speak for itself…
post.content: Every so often, you just have to pick up the camera to take a picture of something. This morning, it was the sky directly outside my front door. I’ll let the picture speak for itself…
post.title: Early Morning Sky
